Fastoodle is an interactive extension where you can enjoy fast and free doodling on your home screen, as well as saving the image to your computer


By clicking “Add to Chrome”, I accept and agree to installing the Fastoodle extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use (https://fastoodle.com/end-user-license-agreement/)
and Policy (https://fastoodle.com/privacy-policy/)
